"Candle carving" - a new art form where people can create intricate designs and sculptures out of candles using specialized tools and techniques.
"Candle scavenger hunt" - an interactive game where players have to find and collect candles of different shapes, sizes, and colors within a certain time frame.
"Candle meditation" - a guided meditation practice that involves lighting candles and focusing on their flickering flames to promote relaxation and mindfulness.
"Candle-making workshop" - a hands-on experience where people can learn how to make their own candles from scratch using natural ingredients and essential oils.
"Candle-themed escape room" - a themed escape room where players have to solve puzzles and clues related to candles and candle-making to escape the room.
